name: ScrewBits
description:
Made for the USC Mega April Fool's Game Jam 2023.

If you want to start the song, press 'p'

Press space to drill in each screw! Try to match the rhythm.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What would u do for April Fools?

Do u celebrate this holiday?

I made this game, and it turned out cool

But I made it so it autoplays

(For real, try it!)          

You might pull a prank, on April Fools

Perhaps tell a corny joke

Like, Why couldn't the bad sailor learn the alphabet?

Because he always got lost at "C"

Having a little fun, on April Fools

Like wearing your shirts as pants

Maybe I swapped your cereal, with my dog's food

Or I leaked governments secrets about their lizard overloards, as a prank, as a prank. Im sorry

--Bridge

Watch your back today

Don't lose your way

Remember that it's only just a prank

What would u do for April Fools?

Let us celebrate this holiday

Remember to have fun, and don't be a tool

And hurting people physically or emotionally is NOT a prank
